CustomField.description: Verbal translation of the Risk Value NICC-035711
CustomField.formula: IF ( Inherent_Risk_Value__c >= 20, "Very High", IF ( Inherent_Risk_Value__c >= 12, "High", IF ( Inherent_Risk_Value__c >= 6, "Medium", IF ( Inherent_Risk_Value__c >= 3, "Low", IF ( Inherent_Risk_Value__c >= 1, "Very Low", IF ( Inherent_Risk_Value__c = 0, "N/A", "TBD" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Overall Asset Risk Assessment (highest risk level of all related Assessments)
CustomField.label: Inherent Risk Level
